name: Bbb-ds1820
tagline: Temperaturmessung mit einem Beaglebone Black und DS1820-Sensoren
body:
# bbb-ds1820
***


## General Information:
Scripts in PHP and Python to read a DS1820 Temperaturesensor with a Beaglebone Black (http://beagleboard.org/Products/BeagleBone+Black). In the long term, it will grow to a homemade, opensource/openhardware weatherstation using an Anemometer, humidity sensor, light sensor and other stuff.

## Copyright:
As long as not otherwise noted, all my stuff here is cc by-nc-sa
(https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/4.0/ ) which means:
	
* Attribution — You must give appropriate credit, provide a link to the license, and indicate if changes were made. You may do so in any reasonable manner, but not in any way that suggests the licensor endorses you or your use

* NonCommercial — You may not use the material for commercial purposes.

* ShareAlike — If you remix, transform, or build upon the material, you must distribute your contributions under the same license as the original.
	
## Coding Style:
I'm not the best coder at all. If you find some bugs or have some ideas or suggestions, feel free to write me an email to :
	
ragnar[at]chaosdorf.de
